member.name: P:ColorScheme.ColorScheme.RowStatusFlag
member.summary: All rows are defined with RowStatus, active rowstatus is 0, previous history in 1,2,3...etc

member.name: P:ColorScheme.ColorScheme.TblMetaData
member.summary: Define metadata of table as hashtable keys are PrimaryKey,ExcludeToCompare(Comma separated field names which will exclude while comparing),PlusValueFields(Comma separated field names in which new values will increament by one for all rows in datatable),CommonValueFields(Comma separated field names in which new values will be replaced by a common value for all rows of datatable),RowStatusFlag(True,if Row history to be maintained,),TableEntryFlag(A=Append,M=Modify,D=Delete),TextField (Default sorting Field apeared in a drop-down-list)

member.name: F:ColorScheme.ColorScheme._Updated
member.summary: True if table rows are updated in current session

member.name: P:ColorScheme.ColorScheme.RepeatAsNew
member.summary: True if previous row is added as new row with new primary key

member.name: P:ColorScheme.ColorScheme.LastKeyValues
member.summary: A hashtable having incrementing fields of sql table are as keys and values are new values to be inserted in SqlTable,Keys are Table,Field1,Field2..etc.

member.name: P:ColorScheme.ColorScheme.FieldsPlusCollection
member.summary: An array of collection having the values of keys are [Table,LastKeyField,Condition,Variables] where all are string and varibles as hashtable(Keys are variablenames and values are variable values]

member.name: P:ColorScheme.ColorScheme.SchemaTable
member.summary: SchemaTable as datatable with columns Column_Name,Data_Type,Size

member.name: P:ColorScheme.ColorScheme.MultyRowsSqlHandling
member.summary: Type of rows insertion/updation for sql querry
